full_address: 39a NATHAN VALLEY ROAD, Mount Nathan, Qld 4211
description:
A rare opportunity to secure this unique family home situated on a huge newly re-aligned 6606sqm block of land, perched high in sought after Mt Nathan. This stunning north facing home features beautifully appointed timber floors and extra high ceilings throughout. A well appointed kitchen, the hub of the home comprises a large centred Quartz benchtop, European Appliances, Gas cooking and Butlers pantry.

Open plan living areas, with feature windows framing the beautiful picturesque surroundings of lush green rolling hills. Bi fold doors open to one of several sunny outdoor entertaining areas with spa and tranquil water feature.

Five (5) bedrooms, including a substantial Master suite with feature bath, walk in robe and ensuite and your own balcony over looking the pool.
Each additional bedroom features built in robes, ceiling fans and beautiful timber flooring. A great rarely seen bedroom 2 has a mezzanine loft level built in with a huge walk in robe and or private study space. Every kids dream.

The home is Eco friendly and has been designed with Sustainable living in mind with 5 Kw Solar panels, bio-cycle sewage, established gardens and impressive landscaping and retaining walls compliments this stunning home.

Quick Property Features

- 5 Bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR
- 2 bathrooms + powder room
- Multiple Open Plan Living areas with timber floors throughout
- Quartz benchtops, European Appliances, dual dishwashers, Butler pantry
- Ducted Air Conditioning, Gas Cooking
- Floor Layout Total 438.45sqm of stunning home
- 6606sqm of fully usable land
- Designated 400sqm building envelope for a shed for all the toys or workshop
- 3 car garage and or 2 and a workshop or multi-use room
- Fully fenced property

Close proximity to local shops only 10 minutes away, easy access to M1 and only a short drive to the beaches an award winning restaurants, great schools and all that the Gold Coast has to offer.

This amazing home has been recently re-aligned and boundaries amended to now offer a 6606sqm allotment.

Simply a beautiful family home, or would make a great holiday home, work from home space or investment property. You cant loose here with its versatility and opportunity.

All of this and still so much opportunity for the new home owner.

For more information or to arrange an inspection, contact Kelle on 0410 951 202.
